title: ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Administrative Assistant Post
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Administrative Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the addre...
